tutorial.speak:
Welcome to Lessons dot church. Let's get you registered. Start by visiting lessons dot church, then click the Register button.
Enter your first name, last name, and email address, then click Register.
You will receive a confirmation message. Check your email from support at churchapps dot org to verify your account. If you don't see it in your inbox, check your spam folder.
Click the link in the email, and you'll be prompted to set a password. Enter your password, verify it, then click Sign In.
Next, you'll be prompted to select a church. Click in the search box.
Type your church name to search for it. If your church is not found, click the Register a New Church link at the bottom.
A confirmation dialog will appear. Click OK to continue.
Enter your church information including name, address, city, state, zip code, and country. Then click Save.
Your church will now be registered and you'll be taken to the church selection screen. Click on your church to continue.
You're all set! You can now access the classroom management dashboard and start using Lessons dot church.
